thumb.name: Enjoy the Years Ahead
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EOn Your Retirement%3Cbr%3Efrom Riverside Bank.%3Cbr%3EBrian%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThis is a time for thinking of%3Cbr%3EThe busy years you%26#146;ve spent.%3Cbr%3EOf your friends and achievements%3Cbr%3Ehere at our firm%3Cbr%3EAnd all that they have meant...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThis is a time to look ahead%3Cbr%3ETo all you plan to do%3Cbr%3EAs you enjoy the carefree years%3Cbr%3ERetirement should bring to you!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWith Congratulations%3Cbr%3Eand Best Wishes%3Cbr%3Efrom the Board of Directors%3Cbr%3Eof Riverside Bank%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Wonderful New Start
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EOn Your Retirement.%3Cbr%3EMichael%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ERetirement Is...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EAccomplishments. fond memories.%3Cbr%3Enew goals ahead of you.%3Cbr%3EDreams you thought%3Cbr%3Eyou set aside --%3Cbr%3Ejust waiting to come true...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EA milestone on life's journey.%3Cbr%3Ea wonderful new start.%3Cbr%3EAnd it brings congratulations.%3Cbr%3Ewarmest wishes --%3Cbr%3Efrom the heart.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappiness Always

thumb.name: Relax and Have Fun
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ETom.%3Cbr%3ECongratulations on Your Retirement%3Cbr%3Eto North Carolina%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ENow you'll have time%3Cbr%3Efor all the things%3Cbr%3Eyou enjoy most --%3Cbr%3Eand lots of visits%3Cbr%3Efrom the people%3Cbr%3Eyou love best!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ERelax and Have Fun

thumb.name: Relax!
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EJust think. Rose. retirement means that you can do nothing at all%26#133;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%26#133;just like our boss. Congratulations%3Cbr%3E
